name: Inflection Point
description:
Inflection Point is a rhythmic maze game involving strategic timing and unexpected twists.

At first, you're simply navigating your way through a maze, from start to finish. But along the way, expect to encounter "inflection points" that teleport you, redirect you, adjust your speed, or otherwise stop you in your tracks. Finishing the entire game will require quick decision-making and a determination to outmaneuver the maze.

The game also includes a fully-featured Level Editor, allowing you to design your own mazes of varying complexity. You can save the levels you create, and also share them with friends or family.
